section.p: Aside from the status icons in front of files in the Solution Explorer, a more detailed view of the changes made to files can be obtained with Ankh. This is done with the Diff command.

list.item: 1. Select and right click the file(s) you want to diff in Solution Explorer.
2. Click the Diff command in the menu.

p.b: The following page will appear in Visual Studios web browser.

list.item: 1. Shows which file that has been diff'ed.
2. Shows which revision the file is being diff'ed against.
3. Shows the line number and position of a section that differs.

section.p: NOTE: In the Commit dialog you can also see diff on all files you are committing.
